Package org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DomainProfileService
    Service to perform operations on a tree of domain objects described by a domain profile.
    DomainProfileStore
    Manage a set of domain profiles.
    IPMService  
    OpenPackageService
    A service to open a package at various points in its life-cycle.
    Package
    Serialized data package.
    PackageChecksumService
    Generate checksums for file artifacts in a package.
    PackageGenerationService
    Manages the package generation workflow.
    PackageGenerator
    This is the format-specific package generator.
    PropertyFormatService
    Service to display and parse property values.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PackagingFormat
    Defines the set of supported packaging formats.
